name: Release v0.66.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.66.0

# Changelog since v0.65.2
## Changes by Kind

### Refactor

- Automatically add new installations to a group based on lowest installation count ([#748](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/748), [@fmartingr](https://github.com/fmartingr))

### Feature

- Add recent events to installation report cmd output ([#763](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/763), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add rotator support to resize operation ([#749](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/749), [@fmartingr](https://github.com/fmartingr))
- Set default_text_search_config to pg_catalog.english ([#760](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/760), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Tag RDS resources with the ClusterID they belong to. ([#756](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/756), [@fmartingr](https://github.com/fmartingr))

### Bug or Regression

- Increase default evict grace period. ([#758](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/758), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Update sloth from v0.10.0 to v0.11.0 ([#757](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/757), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))


The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.66.0`

_Thanks to all our contributors!_

name: Release v0.64.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.64.0

# Changelog since v0.63.3
## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Change instance metadata httpTokens default behavior. (#740, @stafot)
- Kops upgrade to 1.23 and terraform bump to v1.0.7 (#737, @stafot)
- Upgrade nginx to v4.2.0 (#695, @stafot)

### Refactor

- Refactor calico to be handled by Kops (#738, @stafot)
- Basic implementation of EKS provisioner (#739, @Szymongib)
- EKS Provisioner API and CLI support (#743, @Szymongib)

### Bug or Regression

- Attach custom node policy to master nodes too (#742, @stafot)
- Fix a bug in calico provisioning and make calico default CNI (#745, @stafot)

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Add schema count in installation report command (#744, @gabrieljackson)



## Dependencies

### Changed
- github.com/google/go-cmp: [v0.5.6 → v0.5.8](https://github.com/google/go-cmp/compare/v0.5.6...v0.5.8)


The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.64.0`

_Thanks to all our contributors!_

name: Release v0.61.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.61.0

# Changelog since v0.59.0
## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Bump kube-spot-termination-notice-handler to v1.21.2 (#689, @stafot)
- Bump kubecost to v1.95.0 (#687, @stafot)
- Bump terraform to v0.15.5 (#707, @stafot)
- Upgrade Velero to v2.31.3 (#711, @Mshahidtaj)
- Upgrade kops to 1.22 (#708, @stafot)
- Upgrade nginx-internal to v4.2.0 (#694, @stafot)
- Refactor utilities to not depend on Kops (#706, @Szymongib)

### Feature

- Add API metrics (#704, @gabrieljackson)
- Add cluster-installation ready state (#715, @gabrieljackson)
- Add installation deletion limit (#703, @gabrieljackson)
- Add installation deletion queuing (#700, @gabrieljackson)
- Add query time stats to the dashboard command (#709, @gabrieljackson)
- Increase installation report command output (#716, @gabrieljackson)

### Bug or Regression

- Fix max nodes cluster value updates (#698, @gabrieljackson)
- Fix sloth check on provision phase (#710, @stafot)
- Revert Thanos back on 0.26.0 version to fix introduced decoupling bugs (#699, @stylianosrigas)
- Add flag to disable DNS updates on Installation update (#701, @Szymongib)
- Improve pgbouncer DNS performance (#712, @angeloskyratzakos)
-  Revert "Upgrade kops to 1.22 (#717, @gabrieljackson)  


### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Add more error logging for mmctl failures (#713, @gabrieljackson)
- Additional internal accounting for deletion-pending installations (#702, @gabrieljackson)

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.61.0`

_Thanks to all our contributors!_

name: Release v0.59.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.59.0

# Changelog since v0.58.0

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Bump RTCD to 1.1.0 (#686, @stafot)
- Bump sloth to v0.10.0 (#688, @stafot)
- Upgrade Promtail to 6.2.2 (#696, @stylianosrigas)

### Feature

- Add call security group configuration to cluster Resources for cluster creation. (#679, @d-wierdsma)
- Add cluster resource threshold scheduling overrides (#691, @gabrieljackson)
- Use cluster resource cache for final scheduling action (#682, @gabrieljackson)
- Accept 'ready' for Cluster Installation
  Update Operator to 1.19.0-rc.0 (#684, @Szymongib)
- Add option to disable DB check init containers (#693, @Szymongib)
- Add option to disable Route53 DNS records creation (#697, @Szymongib)
- Bump Operator to 1.19.0-rc.1 (#692, @Szymongib)
- Remove Blackbox related logic from hibernation flow (#681, @Szymongib)
- Support custom Installation sizes in Provisioner (#690, @Szymongib)

### Bug or Regression

- Allow mattermost port to be accessed by prometheus in network policy (#685, @stylianosrigas)
- Skip cluster resource check for certain states (#683, @gabrieljackson)


## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
- github.com/mattermost/mattermost-operator: [v1.18.0 → v1.19.0-rc.1](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-operator/compare/v1.18.0...v1.19.0-rc.1)

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.59.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors*

name: Release v0.58.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.58.0

# Changelog since v0.57.1

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add an extra utility, Cloudprober, to monitor uptime of the customer installations (#678, @spirosoik)
- Add pod count capacity scheduling (#674, @gabrieljackson)
- Change annotation reflecting the Installation hibernation state to label (#671, @Szymongib)
- Optimize search path (aka ndots option) in Mattermost Cloud Workspaces (#667, @stafot)
- Update provisioner cluster upgrade defaults for better drain stability (#672, @stylianosrigas)

### Bug or Regression

- Fix typo for cloudprober canonical name and its handler (#680, @spirosoik)
- Increase pgbouncer max client connections (#677, @stafot)
- Remove legacy metrics-server removal code. (#676, @stafot)

### Uncategorized

- Add flags to configure max Installations per DB cluster (#675, @Szymongib)
- Add option to force restart Installations in the group (#673, @Szymongib)

## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
_Nothing has changed._

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.58.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors*

body:
# Release notes for v0.55.0

# Changelog since v0.54.1

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Set default Prometheus version to latest stable ([#646](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/646), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Feature

- Add endpoints to modify Group annotations ([#657](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/657), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add group selection based on annotations ([#644](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/644), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add max pods per worker node configuration option ([#643](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/643), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add support for metrics server utility ([#645](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/645), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Add velero as utility in the clusters for backing up k8s ([#640](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/640), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- Attach an extra policy for velero ([#660](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/660), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- RTCD helm chart deployment with provisioner ([#656](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/656), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Skip AMI update for calls instance group ([#647](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/647), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Upgrade Fluentbit to latest stable version 0.20.1 ([#648](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/648), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Bug or Regression

- Fix missing helm repository for utilities ([#655](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/655), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- Revert custom NGINX template as not needed ([#641](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/641), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Correct Staticcheck issues ([#642](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/642), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
_Nothing has changed._

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._


The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.55.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors*

name: Release v0.54.1
body:
# Release notes for v0.54.1

# Changelog since v0.54.0

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Bump dependencies and other small improvements ([#627](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/627), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Bump terraform version to v0.14.11 ([#629](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/629), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Update Operator manifest to v1.18.0 ([#630](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/630), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Upgrade NGINX default version ([#623](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/623), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Use new CR ingress config ([#625](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/625), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

### Refactor

- Improve CI exec error handling ([#639](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/639), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Feature

- Add `PriorityEnv` support to Installations ([#618](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/618), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add cluster resource cache ([#632](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/632), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add delete multi-tenant database endpoint ([#622](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/622), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Fetch AMI from existing clusters in e2e ([#637](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/637), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Hide installation env vars in CLI output ([#614](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/614), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Support multiple domains for Installation ([#634](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/634), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Upgrade default versions for Thanos, Prometheus and Nginx ([#628](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/628), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Use HistogramVec to collect metrics ([#616](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/616), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Use both route53 and cloudflare for DNS ([#617](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/617), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))

### Bug or Regression

- Allow events to appear in switched order ([#638](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/638), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Fix a bug where teleport applies wrong version during reprovisioning ([#621](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/621), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Increase timeout k8s-spot-termination-handler.
  This aims to fix some random failures we noticed on re-provisioning and on e2e clusters. ([#624](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/624), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Revert custom NGINX template as not needed ([#641](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/641), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Uncategorized

- Add custom nginx template and nginx namespace handling ([#635](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/635), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Improve e2e test edge cases, fix populate sample data command ([#633](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/633), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Updated in-product link to legacy domain. ([#619](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/619), [@cwarnermm](https://github.com/cwarnermm))
- Upgrade Promtail to v2.5.0 via 4.2.0 Helm chart version ([#636](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/636), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Use Calico as default ([#631](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/631), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

## Dependencies

### Added
- github.com/antlr/antlr4/runtime/Go/antlr: [b48c857](https://github.com/antlr/antlr4/runtime/Go/antlr/tree/b48c857)
- github.com/benbjohnson/clock: [v1.1.0](https://github.com/benbjohnson/clock/tree/v1.1.0)
- github.com/cloudflare/cloudflare-go: [v0.31.0](https://github.com/cloudflare/cloudflare-go/tree/v0.31.0)
- github.com/cockroachdb/errors: [v1.2.4](https://github.com/cockroachdb/errors/tree/v1.2.4)
- github.com/cockroachdb/logtags: [eb05cc2](https://github.com/cockroachdb/logtags/tree/eb05cc2)
- github.com/dave/dst: [v0.26.2](https://github.com/dave/dst/tree/v0.26.2)
- github.com/felixge/httpsnoop: [v1.0.1](https://github.com/felixge/httpsnoop/tree/v1.0.1)
- github.com/google/cel-go: [v0.9.0](https://github.com/google/cel-go/tree/v0.9.0)
- github.com/google/cel-spec: [v0.6.0](https://github.com/google/cel-spec/tree/v0.6.0)
- github.com/orijtech/structslop: [v0.0.6](https://github.com/orijtech/structslop/tree/v0.0.6)
- github.com/sagikazarmark/crypt: [v0.4.0](https://github.com/sagikazarmark/crypt/tree/v0.4.0)
- github.com/urfave/cli/v2: [v2.3.0](https://github.com/urfave/cli/v2/tree/v2.3.0)
- go.etcd.io/etcd/api/v3: v3.5.1
- go.etcd.io/etcd/client/pkg/v3: v3.5.1
- go.etcd.io/etcd/client/v2: v2.305.1
- go.etcd.io/etcd/client/v3: v3.5.0
- go.etcd.io/etcd/pkg/v3: v3.5.0
- go.etcd.io/etcd/raft/v3: v3.5.0
- go.etcd.io/etcd/server/v3: v3.5.0
- go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/google.golang.org/grpc/otelgrpc: v0.20.0
- go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/net/http/otelhttp: v0.20.0

- go.opentelemetry.io/otel/oteltest: v0.20.0

- go.opentelemetry.io/otel/sdk/metric: v0.20.0
- go.opentelemetry.io/otel/sdk: v0.20.0
- go.opentelemetry.io/otel/trace: v0.20.0
- go.opentelemetry.io/otel: v0.20.0
- sigs.k8s.io/json: c049b76

### Changed
- cloud.google.com/go/firestore: v1.1.0 → v1.6.1
- cloud.google.com/go: v0.97.0 → v0.99.0
- github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go: [v57.1.0+incompatible → v26.5.0+incompatible](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/compare/v57.1.0...v26.5.0)

name: Release v0.54.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.54.0
# Changelog since v0.53.1

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Bump dependencies and other small improvements ([#627](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/627), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Upgrade NGINX default version ([#623](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/623), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Use new CR ingress config ([#625](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/625), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

### Feature

- Add `PriorityEnv` support to Installations ([#618](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/618), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add delete multi-tenant database endpoint ([#622](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/622), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Hide installation env vars in CLI output ([#614](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/614), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Use HistogramVec to collect metrics ([#616](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/616), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Bug or Regression

- Fix a bug where teleport applies wrong version during reprovisioning ([#621](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/621), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Uncategorized

- Updated in-product link to legacy domain. ([#619](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/619), [@cwarnermm](https://github.com/cwarnermm))

## Dependencies

# Release notes for v0.53.0
# Changelog since v0.52.0

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Update provisioner to work with new Gitlab repo utilities ([#613](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/613), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Deprecation

- Remove stackrox utility from provisioner deployments ([#612](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/612), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Feature

- Add cluster installation duration metrics ([#610](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/610), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add metrics for installation changes ([#608](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/608), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Expose base prometheus metrics on separate port ([#607](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/607), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Support multiple public hosted zones ([#609](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/609), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))


The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.53.0`

Thanks to all our contributors!!!!

name: v0.52.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.52.0
# Changelog since v0.51.0

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Use mattermost/kube-spot-termination-notice-handler container (#590, @stafot)

### Feature

- Add Event Listener tool (#594, @Szymongib)
- Add checks for events to e2e (#589, @Szymongib)
- Add support for Promtail utility in provisioner (#595, @stylianosrigas)
- Build cluster e2e tests image as part of CI (#601, @Szymongib)
- Upgrade kops to 1.21 and terraform to 0.13 (#598, @stafot)
- Upgrade kops to 1.21 and terraform to 0.15 (#596, @stafot)

### Bug or Regression

- Make better Installation DNS configuration in e2e (#602, @Szymongib)
- Skip DB cleanup if database is marked as deleted (#603, @Szymongib)
- Fix wrong Teleport kube agent default name (#604, @stylianosrigas)

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Cleanup Teleport utility destruction (#600, @Szymongib)
- Close database connections in some unit tests (#592, @Szymongib)
- Redact AWS requests parameters (#591, @Szymongib)


The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.52.0`

Thanks to all our contributors!!!!

name: Release v0.50.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.50.0
# Changelog since v0.49.0

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Bump alpine to 3.14 and golang to 1.17.4. ([#584](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/584), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Bump bifrost to v1.0.3 ([#582](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/582), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Bump k8s-spot-termination-handler to fix security vulnerabilities.
  Increase resources. ([#573](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/573), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Bump kubecost to 1.88.1 ([#579](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/579), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))

### Feature

- Add Provisioner Events model and store ([#574](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/574), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add Subscriptions and Events API and CLI ([#581](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/581), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add support for new Teleport Kube Agent utility ([#580](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/580), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Implement event Producer and Deliverer ([#578](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/578), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Pgbouncer config pool sizes update as per fine-tuning ([#577](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/577), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Provisioner will now skip re-provisioning utilities unless `--reprovision-all-utilities` is specified, or the utility's desired version is explicitly included on the command line. ([#562](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/562), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))

### Bug or Regression

- Use mmctl for getting and setting Mattermost config ([#576](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/576), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Remove v1alpha1 CR support ([#575](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/575), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))



The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.50.0`

Thanks to all our contributors!!!!

# Release notes for v0.49.0

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

### Refactor

name: Release v0.48.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.48.0

# Changelog since v0.47.1

## Changes by Kind

### Refactor

- Adapt PGBouncer config to improve connections and CPU performance ([#555](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/555), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Feature to skip already migrated installation during migration process ([#538](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/538), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))
- SLO target change for errors from 99.9 to 99.5.
  Updating SLO resources functionality addition.
  Minor typo fixes. ([#552](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/552), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))

### Chore

- Bump kubecost to 1.87.0 ([#546](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/546), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Bump kubecost version to 1.86.1.
  This version fixes some legacy metrics reliance. ([#537](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/537), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Reduce min pool size to 3 from 5 in provisioner ([#556](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/556), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Pgbouncer increase min pool size from 3 to 5 ([#557](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/557), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Update default Teleport chart version to 0.4.1 ([#549](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/549), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Feature

- Add configuration for max connections per DB pool ([#551](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/551), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add flags for default and min pool size PGBouncer configuration ([#558](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/558), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Add svc for Calico felix metrics ([#540](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/540), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Added desktop notifications to cwl tool ([#543](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/543), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
- Create initial end-to-end tests for cluster lifecycle ([#539](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/539), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Fix configuration setting for pgbouncer ([#548](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/548), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Reduce logs and set tcp configurations for pgbouncer ([#545](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/545), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Upgrade Fluent-bit helm chart version to 0.17.0 ([#542](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/542), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Upgrade Pgbouncer helm chart to 1.2.0 and pgbouncer app to 1.15.0 ([#550](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/550), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Upgrade Stackrox version to 65.1.0 ([#544](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/544), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- [testwick] Add sleep between posting messages in channels ([#559](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/559), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- Returning JSON response from Cluster installation migration-related API's. ([#547](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/547), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))

### Bug or Regression

- Testwick enhanced:
  - Higher variance for names generator for channels
  - retries for channel creation ([#541](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/541), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))

## Dependencies

### Added
- github.com/0xAX/notificator: [c42e3d4](https://github.com/0xAX/notificator/tree/c42e3d4)

### Changed
_Nothing has changed._

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.48.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors*

body:
# Release notes for v0.47.1

# Changelog since v0.47.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add database cmd table options ([#531](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/531), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

- Fix for collecting kops node instance types ([#533](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/533), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

## Dependencies

*Thanks to all our contributors*

name: Release v0.47.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.47.0

# Changelog since v0.46.1

## Changes by Kind

### Chore

- Update Fluent-bit helm chart version to 0.16.6 ([#522](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/522), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Update default Thanos version to 5.2.1 ([#517](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/517), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))

### Refactor

- Remove alerting block from installation SLIs.
  Moved to a generalized alerting approach with thanos. ([#525](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/525), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Feature to skip already migrated installation during migration process ([#538](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/538), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))

### Feature

- Add ability to specify custom columns for the table output ([#519](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/519), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add database resource list and get API endpoints ([#524](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/524), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add extra fields for AMI ID and Status of the cluster in the following command:
  cloud cluster list --table ([#501](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/501), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- Add server flag to configure max installation schemas ([#520](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/520), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add sloth tool.
  Implement first SLI for mattermost installations. ([#482](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/482), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Adding extra utility cluster to be provisioned for node problem detection. ([#509](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/509), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- Check v1beta1 reconciling resources with ObservedGeneration ([#499](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/499), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Improve secret manager secret cleanup ([#505](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/505), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Update Prometheus chart version to 18.0.3 ([#518](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/518), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Update default Fluentbit version to 0.16.4 ([#515](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/515), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Added new state import-complete to aid state synchronization with AWAT at end of imports ([#498](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/498), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
- Deploy calico CNI at cluster creation time if networking option is calico.
  - deploy or reprovision calico netpol if current networking option is other then calico ([#513](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/513), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))

### Design

- Refactor proxy database resource records ([#516](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/516), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Bug or Regression

- Add missing flags for provisioner and node problem detector values and version ([#510](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/510), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- Add missing utility flags for processing ([#511](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/511), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- BugFix: Avoid installation creation failure when Sloth CRD doesn't not exist on cluster. ([#504](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/504), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Convert installation DNS to lowercase ([#500](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/500), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Ensure multitenant DB users are removed ([#508](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/508), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Fix listing kops clusters if there is only one or no clusters ([#526](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/526), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Fix typo on label on SLI/SLOs creation query ([#502](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/502), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Fixes a bug on provisioning of k8s-spot-termination-handler daemonSet. ([#503](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/503), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Fixes sloth alerting. ([#529](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/529), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Installation removal fix for pgbouncer resource records ([#530](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/530), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Patch sloth podMonitor before reprovision to avoid provision failure. ([#514](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/514), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Fixed version and valuespath validation for cluster utilities ([#507](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/507), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Standardize multitenant database IDs ([#497](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/497), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

name: Release v0.46.1
body:
# Release notes for v0.46.1

# Changelog since v0.46.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add checks for gofmt and goimports ([#486](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/486), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add installation deployment report command ([#490](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/490), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Adding a new isolated tool called `testwick` and it is used to create multiple installations and interact with them ([#489](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/489), [@spirosoik](https://github.com/spirosoik))
- Configure Node and AZ anti-affinity for Mattermost pods ([#494](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/494), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Handling migration of hibernated installations & DNS switch. ([#484](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/484), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))
- Added cancellation behavior to Imports against `deleted` Installations ([#495](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/495), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))

### Bug or Regression

- Add option to retry cluster creation from command line ([#488](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/488), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Fix for cluster ID to start with non numeric digit.
  Also quick fix for calico cni manifest for new cluster creation if networking is calico. ([#492](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/492), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))
- Fix for locking both hibernating & non hibernating installations during dns switch with some test coverage. ([#491](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/491), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))


## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
_Nothing has changed._

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.46.1`
 
*Thanks to all our contributors*

name: Release v0.46.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.46.0

# Changelog since v0.45.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add API for database migrations ([#465](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/465), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add API(s) & CLI commands for cluster migration. ([#468](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/468), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))
- Add CLI commands for Installation DB migration and restoration ([#469](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/469), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add DB migration e2e test ([#481](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/481), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add DB migration rollback mechanism and cleanup for restorations and migrations ([#461](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/461), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add DatabseBackupType to Installation backup ([#463](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/463), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add PGBouncer installation databases ([#472](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/472), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add installation updates to wake-up requests ([#466](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/466), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add log message when Installation annotations do not match any cluster ([#471](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/471), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add multitenant database update API endpoint ([#476](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/476), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add support for Stackrox 
  - Remove local utility Helm values dependency. ([#480](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/480), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Adds kubecost helm-chart to have more granular costs allocation. ([#479](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/479), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Adds server flags to handle spot-instances notifications ([#460](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/460), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Handling migration of hibernated installations & DNS switch. ([#484](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/484), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))
- Update kOps and kubernetes to 1.20 ([#475](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/475), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Add flags and logic to control mysql and minio operator deployments in cloud clusters. ([#470](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/470), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Retrieve only active cluster installations during VPC search for an installation. ([#478](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/478), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))


### Bug or Regression

- BugFix: Keep old calico version for policy only usage. ([#487](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/487), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Set `binary_parameters=yes` for PGBouncer databases ([#477](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/477), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Skip cluster deletion if it does not exist ([#485](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/485), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Update to latest Calico CNI. ([#483](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/483), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Refactor clusters API handlers ([#473](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/473), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))


## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
- github.com/mattermost/awat: [463fd56 → f0bdd4f](https://github.com/mattermost/awat/compare/463fd56...f0bdd4f)

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.46.0`
 
*Thanks to all our contributors*

name: Release v0.45.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.45.0

# Changelog since v0.44.1

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add Installation DB restoration model. ([#443](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/443), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add installation database migration model and store ([#449](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/449), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add installation recovery command ([#456](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/456), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add installation restoration supervisor ([#446](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/446), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Create k8s license secrets with unique names ([#457](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/457), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Fluentbit input db configuration to avoid duplicate logs ([#452](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/452), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Implement Installation DB restoration API ([#458](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/458), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- New pgbouncer deployment as utility ([#444](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/444), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Release Mattermost operator v1.14.0 in provisioner ([#459](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/459), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Add Installation restoration job handling ([#440](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/440), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add metrics for Fluentbit and upgrade default version ([#448](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/448), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Added fix from Bifrost to solve filestore delete bug ([#447](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/447), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
- Added supervisor to perform Workspace imports ([#439](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/439), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
- Implement DB Migration supervisor ([#455](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/455), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Introduce components common functionalities package ([#454](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/454), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

### Bug or Regression

- Fix nil VPC ID value references ([#453](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/453), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Gave the mocked interfaces packages unique names ([#450](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/450), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Remove ES endpoint configuration to be handled by utility group values externally ([#462](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/462), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

## Dependencies

### Added

# Release notes for v0.44.0

# Changelog since v0.43.2

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Adds ` k8s-spot-termination-handler` Daemonset to handle spot instances termination notices. ([#430](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/430), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Installation backup API ([#432](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/432), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Introduce Backup supervisor ([#428](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/428), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Preparation for CNI support ([#435](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/435), [@Mshahidtaj](https://github.com/Mshahidtaj))
- Update kOps and other tooling ([#431](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/431), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Update utility values for dev to use new utilities node group ([#436](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/436), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Add group ID env var to installations ([#442](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/442), [@jwilander](https://github.com/jwilander))


### Bug or Regression

- Fix for a CLRF injection attack in the wakeup process due to nginx ([#438](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/438), [@ethervoid](https://github.com/ethervoid))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Unify paging logic across different models ([#433](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/433), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
_Nothing has changed._

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.44.0`

# Release notes for v0.39.0

# Changelog since v0.38.0
## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add 'state' as an installation list filter ([#405](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/405), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Fix AMI check and validate kops change requests ([#408](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/408), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Improved server startup check ([#409](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/409), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Updates to use terraform 0.12.29, kops 1.18.3 and kubectl version 1.18.15 ([#410](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/410), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
- Updating utility default values to meet dev requirements. ([#404](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/404), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Use Mattermost CR instead of ClusterInstallation for new Installation ([#403](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/403), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

### Bug or Regression

- Fix v1alpha1 hibernation replica count check ([#406](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/406), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Fixed bug in Gitlab utility values paths fetching logic ([#402](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/402), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Hide installation license value in CLI output ([#407](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/407), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
- Terraform 0.12.29
- KOPS 1.18.3
### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.39.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors*

# Release notes for v0.37.0

# Changelog since v0.36.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add kops client caching ([#389](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/389), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Webhooks: add environment to the webhooks payload ([#386](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/386), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
- Add DB Connection check URL to Secret when using Postgres database ([#364](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/364), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add Network Policy for Beta spec Mattermost CRs ([#390](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/390), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Add prometheus-adapter to implement custom metrics APIService. ([#372](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/372), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
- Added ability to use authenticated GitLab instances with utility values
  DesiredVersion in UtilitiesMetadata now empties when provisioning or creation completes. Verbose Helm debugging can now be controlled with --debug-helm at startup ([#383](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/383), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
- Increase max DB installations to 300 ([#391](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/391), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Reduce retention period for Prometheus local data.

- Add weight for nodeaffinity ([#395](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/395), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Helm updated to version 3.4.4 from 3.3.1 ([#387](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/387), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
- Update retention period to 2d for Prometheus local stored data. ([#393](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/393), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

  - Add ability to specify git repo and branch name for Helm utility values files to be sourced from ([#375](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/375), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
  - Added Prometheus metrics for Installation creation actions. ([#365](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/365), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))

name: Release v0.35.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.35.0

## Changelog since v0.34.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

 - Added cloudburst, a tool for explosive scaling / load testing. ([#350](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/350), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
 - Support configuration of single-tenant RDS via Provisioner API ([#354](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/354), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
 - Add balanced cluster scheduling for installations ([#360](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/360), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Added ability to control Installation configuration to the load testing tool ([#367](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/367), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
 - Release Mattermost Operator v1.11.0 ([#369](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/369), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
 - Groups: add groups status endpoint ([#370](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/370), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Add DNS filter to cloud installation list cmd ([#373](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/373), [@jwilander](https://github.com/jwilander))
 - Enables DNS Metrics scraping on Prometheus ([#374](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/374), [@stafot](https://github.com/stafot))
 - Increase number of max installations per database to 200. ([#380](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/380), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

 - Ctest upgrades and refactor ([#361](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/361), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Cleanup Helm migration code ([#362](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/362), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
 - Adapt Nginx autoscaling, requests and limits to new instance sizes. ([#366](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/366), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
 - Reduce prometheus data retention to 5 days and increase volume size ([#368](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/368), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
 - Rename "InstallationsUnstable" to "InstallationsUpdating" in group status ([#378](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/378), [@jwilander](https://github.com/jwilander))

# Release notes for v0.34.0

## Changelog since v0.33.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add bifrost network policy and better k8s probes ([#355](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/355), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Use affinity/toleration for services apps in the cluster ([#356](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/356), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
- Improvements to Thanos and Prometheus Operator utility groups
  - Remove local Prometheus alerts
  - Increase Thanos query replicas to 2
  - Add service monitor for Thanos Query ([#358](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/358), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Bug or Regression

- Add mattermost job check to allow to talk with bifrost ([#359](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/359), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Collect only the original node metadata information ([#357](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/357), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
_Nothing has changed._

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.34.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors*

# Release notes for v0.33.0

## Changelog since v0.32.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add bifrost filestore option ([#351](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/351), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add bifrost network policy and better k8s probes ([#355](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/355), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add filestore test suite to ctest tool ([#353](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/353), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

- Add flag specifying whether new Installations need to be annotated. ([#345](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/345), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

# Release notes for v0.31.0

## Changelog since v0.30.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add cloud dashboard command ([#329](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/329), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add group no-op update sequence bump option ([#332](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/332), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Adding Prometheus service monitors for Mattermost and NGINX metrics ([#326](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/326), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Handle group updates during installation rollouts ([#327](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/327), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Introducing Thanos utility group.
  - Two R53 records created as part of each Thanos deployment. One targeting then normal ingress and the other one the GRPC ingress that will be used by the central querier. 
  - Autoscaling, requests and limits set for Thanos Querier. ([#322](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/322), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Kops: validate AMI image before running the upgrade k8s cluster ([#319](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/319), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
- Mattermost operator 1.9.0 release ([#325](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/325), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Migrating to Prometheus operator and enabling Thanos sidecar.
  - Adding clusterID label via the operator to be used by Thanos and Grafana. ([#316](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/316), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
- Update cluster installation secrets on installation update ([#323](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/323), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add endpoints to modify annotations on existing Clusters and Installations ([#336](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/336), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Introduce Cluster and Installation Annotations ([#321](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/321), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Migrate to Helm 3 for provisioning utility groups ([#324](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/324), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))
- Schedule Installations on Clusters based on the Annotations ([#330](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/330), [@Szymongib](https://github.com/Szymongib))

### Bug or Regression

- Handle group configuration changes on installation creation ([#334](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/334), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Handle multitenant filestore teardown with no cluster installations ([#335](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/335), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Use correct DB reader endpoints for multitenant databases ([#333](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/333), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- Refactor AWS database connection string logic ([#338](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/338), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

## Dependencies

### Added
- github.com/go-playground/locales: [v0.13.0](https://github.com/go-playground/locales/tree/v0.13.0)
- github.com/go-playground/universal-translator: [v0.17.0](https://github.com/go-playground/universal-translator/tree/v0.17.0)

## Changelog since v0.28.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add S3 Multitenant Filestore ([#306](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/306), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add table output option for resource lists ([#309](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/309), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Check more than state on reconciling cluster installations ([#305](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/305), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Release operator version v1.8.0 ([#311](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/311), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

# Release notes for v0.26.0

## Changelog since v0.25.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add API to list multitenant databases ([#286](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/286), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add dry-run flag for cluster CLI commands ([#288](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/288), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Added endpoint that returns the number of installations: /api/installations/count ([#292](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/292), [@ethervoid](https://github.com/ethervoid))
- Log installation size resource requirements ([#289](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/289), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Bug or Regression

- Drop requests to prometheus ingress if is not using the dns name ([#294](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/294), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- K8s/namespace: when deleting the namespace make sure everything gets deleted as well ([#287](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/287), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
- Update Go dependencies for new installation requirement values ([#290](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/290), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

name: Release v0.25.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.25.0

## Changelog since v0.24.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature

- Add API to list multitenant databases ([#286](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/286), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add PostgreSQL Multitenant Database option ([#283](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/283), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Add cloud resource API security locking ([#281](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/281), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Support is added for Teleport external storage
- Teleport DynamoDB table and S3 bucket are deleted during cluster tear down
- Teleport 0.3.0 is released ([#278](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/278), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Bug or Regression

- Add nginx utility check for ACM resources ([#285](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/285), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
- Shorten database username for Mattermost installations ([#284](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/284), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)

- K8s: if pod is not found continue the check and assume that was part of the old replicaset ([#279](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/279), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
- github.com/lib/pq: [v1.7.0 → v1.8.0](https://github.com/lib/pq/compare/v1.7.0...v1.8.0)

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.25.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors!*

# Release notes for v0.24.0

## Changelog since v0.23.1

## Changes by Kind

### Feature
 - Attach custom IAM policy to Kops node IAM Instance Profiles ([#273](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/273), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
 - Support is added for Teleport external storage
 - Teleport DynamoDB table and S3 bucket are deleted during cluster tear down
 - Teleport 0.3.0 is released ([#278](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/278), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Bug or Regression
 - Mm-operator: update operator to 1.6.1 due infinite reconcile loop ([#276](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/276), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

## Dependencies

### Added
_Nothing has changed._

### Changed
_Nothing has changed._

### Removed
_Nothing has changed._

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.24.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors!*

name: Release v0.23.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.23.0

## Changelog since v0.22.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature
 - Add Postgres single-tenant database option ([#267](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/267), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Add cluster scale up logic ([#259](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/259), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Add database endpoint init check to single tenant databases ([#271](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/271), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Deploy metric-server ([#260](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/260), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Start using k8s official NGINX helm [chart](https://github.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx/tree/master/charts/ingress-nginx).
 - Enable autoscaling, set limits and requests for NGINX ingress controller.
 - Migrate from using separate private and public NGINX deployments to a single deployment that creates both services.
 - Enable use of TLS certificates for internal Load Balancers (Prometheus traffic).
   Follow deprecation instructions in the README.md for cluster reprovisioning steps. ([#263](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/263), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
 - The k8s client `New` method has been renamed to `NewFromFile`. All references will need to be updated.
   The k8s client now supports creation of KubeClient objects with a Kubernetes rest.Config ([#274](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/274), [@nickmisasi](https://github.com/nickmisasi))
 - The mattermost-cloud Kubernetes client now supports Persistent Volumes, and Persistent Volume Claims! ([#268](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/268), [@nickmisasi](https://github.com/nickmisasi))
 - Use PostgreSQL version 11.7 for new databases ([#272](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/272), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Use the AWS_REGION set in the config and not hardcoded ones ([#269](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/269), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Added MM_CLOUD_INSTALLATION_ID env variable to identify mattermost-server installations ([#270](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/270), [@reflog](https://github.com/reflog))
 - Adds new endpoint GET /api/search/name/{query} to allow fetching Installations by name ([#262](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/262), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))


### Other (Cleanup or Flake)
 - Cleanup multitenant database logging ([#257](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/257), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Update kops to 1.17.1 ([#265](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/265), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - You can now include the Mattermost Kubernetes client in other Golang projects.
   Simply `go get github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud` and add the module import `github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/k8s` ([#266](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/266), [@nickmisasi](https://github.com/nickmisasi))

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.23.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors!*

name: Release v0.22.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.22.0

## Changelog since v0.21.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature
 - Add cluster workbench command for cloud client ([#251](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/251), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Update kops to v1.17.0 ([#252](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/252), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Fluent-bit sending security audit logs ([#229](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/229), [@angeloskyratzakos](https://github.com/angeloskyratzakos))
 - Enabled TLS for connections with RDS MySQL databases.
 - Disabled Root CA verification by passing `tls=skip-verify` in the database connection string.
 - Modified multi-tenant database to set require SSL when creating a user for the Mattermost installation database. ([#235](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/235), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)
 - Cleanup multitenant database logging ([#257](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/257), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Move contents of terraform state file to Go constant ([#255](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/255), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Public-nginx: remove nginx version from the responses ([#256](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/256), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.22.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors!*

# Release notes for v0.21.0

## Changelog since v0.20.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature
 - Add cluster workbench command for cloud client ([#251](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/251), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Add git commit hash ([#243](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/243), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Add installation hibernation ([#246](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/246), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Enabled TLS for connections with RDS MySQL databases.
 - Disabled Root CA verification by passing `tls=skip-verify` in the database connection string.
 - Modified multi-tenant database to set require SSL when creating a user for the Mattermost installation database. ([#235](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/235), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))

### Bug or Regression
 - Validate if the request has spaces in some fields ([#241](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/241), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)
 - Set logging output default to stdout ([#245](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/245), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Update `github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go` dependency to  `v1.32.5`
 - Update `github.com/lib/pq` dependency to `v1.7.0`
 - Update `github.com/stretchr/testify` dependency to `v1.6.1`
 - Update all `kubernetes dependencies` to `1.17.7` ([#250](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/250), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Update helm to 2.16.9 / go to 1.14.4 and alpine to 3.12 ([#247](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/247), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

name: Release v0.20.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.20.0

# Changelog since v0.19.0

## Changes by Kind

### Feature
 - Add installation and group env var patching logic ([#222](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/222), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Add option to change cluster AMI on upgrade ([#219](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/219), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Adds teleport utility group ([#233](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/233), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))
 - Deploy calico for network policy and deploy network policy for each Mattermost installation ([#220](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/220), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Refactor cluster metadata handling ([#236](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/236), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Server: add missing syscal to trap the shutdown ([#237](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/237), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Update kops to 1.16.3 ([#230](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/230), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Documentation
 - Bump helm version and correct README ([#240](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/240), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Bug or Regression
 - Fixed logic that constraints query for fetching Multitenant Databases ([#227](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/227), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))
 - Graceful SIGTERM shutdown ([#228](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/228), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Stale cluster and cluster installation supervisor fix ([#225](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/225), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Stale installation supervisor fix ([#224](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/224), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - The versioning for kops now includes a `v` prefix ([#231](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/231), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Other (Cleanup or Flake)
 - Ci: retry image push if fails in the first attempt ([#238](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/238), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Helm: upgrade helm to v2.16.6 ([#232](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/232), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Update `github.com/Masterminds/squirrel` dependency to `v1.4.0`
 - Update `github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go` dependency to `v1.31.0`
 - Update `github.com/golang/mock` dependency to `v1.4.3`
 - Update `github.com/lib/pq` dependency to `v1.5.2`
 - Update `github.com/mattermost/mattermost-operator` dependency to `v1.4.0`
 - Update `github.com/sirupsen/logrus` dependency to `v1.6.0`
 - Update `github.com/spf13/cobra` dependency to `v1.0.0` ([#218](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/218), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Update `github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go` dependency to v1.31.9
 - Update `github.com/lib/pq` dependency to v1.6.0
 - Update `github.com/stretchr/testify` dependency to v1.6.0
 - Set all kubernetes dependencies to 1.16.10 ([#234](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/234), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))

### Uncategorized
 - Add a job and make entry to help us to check the outdated modules ([#217](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/217), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
 - Add installation scaling ([#216](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/216), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
 - Changed the multi-tenant database logic to acquire locks using the instance ID instead of the installation ID.
   - Removed the logic used by the multi-tenant database to auto-release rows in a permanent locked state. This should be done manually by the operator. ([#215](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/215), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))
 - Fixed the issue where the provisioner tries to install a multitenant database in a RDS cluster that does not belong to the acquired VPC.
  - Fixed issue where the provisioner may get stuck trying to teardown an installation id that never had a correspondent multitenant database. ([#223](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/223), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))

## Dependencies

### Added
- github.com/alexbrainman/sspi: [e580b90](https://github.com/alexbrainman/sspi/tree/e580b90)
- github.com/gorilla/securecookie: [v1.1.1](https://github.com/gorilla/securecookie/tree/v1.1.1)
- github.com/gorilla/sessions: [v1.2.0](https://github.com/gorilla/sessions/tree/v1.2.0)
- github.com/jcmturner/aescts/v2: [v2.0.0](https://github.com/jcmturner/aescts/v2/tree/v2.0.0)
- github.com/jcmturner/dnsutils/v2: [v2.0.0](https://github.com/jcmturner/dnsutils/v2/tree/v2.0.0)
- github.com/jcmturner/gofork: [v1.0.0](https://github.com/jcmturner/gofork/tree/v1.0.0)

- rsc.io/quote/v3: v3.1.0
- rsc.io/sampler: v1.3.0

### Changed
- github.com/Azure/go-autorest/autorest/to: [v0.3.0 → v0.2.0](https://github.com/Azure/go-autorest/autorest/to/compare/v0.3.0...v0.2.0)
- github.com/Azure/go-autorest/autorest/validation: [v0.2.0 → v0.1.0](https://github.com/Azure/go-autorest/autorest/validation/compare/v0.2.0...v0.1.0)

name: Release v0.19.0
body:
# Release notes for v0.19.0

# Changelog since v0.18.2

## Changes by Kind

### Feature
  - remove cert-manager and attach AWS ACM in the public Nginx deployment to use SSL certificates ([#214](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/214), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
  - Moves the DNS Registration as a first step in the process. The reason is to give the Cert Manager a head start to register the installation certificate.
  - Adds a InstallationStateCreationFinalTasks state, which handles checks needed before setting the installation to stable. Currently, there is a single check to make sure that the SSL certificate is approved.
  - Adapts tests to the state changes ([#194](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/194), [@stylianosrigas](https://github.com/stylianosrigas))

### Other (Bug, Cleanup or Flake)
  - Create encryption keys with tags.
  - Find encryption keys using resource groups tagging api.
  - Reuse already existent keys when creating RDS instance.
  - Validating that only one key in Enabled state exists when creating instance.
  - Remove keys when installation is deleted.
  - Eliminate the need for creating key alias which was the source for leaking KMS resources. ([#202](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/202), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))
  - Add missing default values for post cluster installation ([#211](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/211), [@cpanato](https://github.com/cpanato))
  - Aws: set log to DEBUG from AWS Session ([#203](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/203), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
  - Check group deletion state before joining installation ([#195](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/195), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))

### Uncategorized
  - Added a new database implementation for handling multiple tenants in a single RDS DB cluster.
  - Added new table MultitenantDatabase so provisioner can keep track of database installations in each RDS cluster.
  - Provisioner will always do lookups in the MultitenantDatabase table first and, if nothing is available, it will try to fetch the resources directly from RDS via resource tags.
  - RDS tags are defined in `tools/aws/constants.go`, however the provisioner does not create them in AWS since this work is done via Terraform.
  - Provisioner uses these tags to identify the correct RDS clusters in order to install new databases.
  - Tag:Counter is maintained by the provisioner. The value is incremented and decremented on every new installation or uninstallation respectively.
  - There is a hardcoded limit in the number database installations that each RDS cluster can take. This limit is referenced by a constant also defined in `tools/aws/constants.go`.
  - The multitenant database follows the same design pattern of all other databases. In fact, it implements the same interface.
  - Small modifications were done to the signature of some the interface's methods . ([#209](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/209), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))
  - Changed the multi-tenant database logic to acquire locks using the instance ID instead of the installation ID.
  - Removed the logic used by the multi-tenant database to auto-release rows in a permanent locked state. This should be done manually by the operator. ([#215](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/215), [@gsagula](https://github.com/gsagula))
  - Add cluster resize functionality ([#213](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/213), [@gabrieljackson](https://github.com/gabrieljackson))
  - Added `--dev` flag for a development mode with sane defaults for running the provisioner server during development ([#205](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/205), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
  - Fixed a bug causing `--dev` to not output DEBUG logs ([#210](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/210), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))
  - Optimized UtilityGroup installation at cluster creation time ([#204](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-cloud/pull/204), [@gigawhitlocks](https://github.com/gigawhitlocks))


The image for this release is `docker.io/mattermost/mattermost-cloud:v0.19.0`

*Thanks to all our contributors!*

name: Several updates
body:
- Add support for new helm repos
- Enable group functionality
- Ability to set a custom image
- Add support for nginx and cert-manager
- Authorize and revoke ingress access of an RDS instance
- Add group API locks

- Adds Machine-readable logs option
- Adds the ability to snapshot RDS database
- Adds MattermostEnv to Group Objects

name: v0.16.0
body: This release adds support for environment variables via the provisioner api.
- bump operator to 1.2.0 and update cdrs
- Allow cluster utility versions to be managed via the API

- Prevent group deletion with installation members
- Lookup private AWS hosted zone domain name (#146)
- Add Https status and write the header in the correct order
- Bump Mattermost operator version to v1.1.0

name: v0.8.0
body:
Changes:
 - Find kops and terraform in the $PATH instead of a hardcoded location
 - Add option for AWS RDS installation databases
 - Fix kubernetes upgrade issues
 - Refactor cluster and installation states and provide report tooling
 - Add cluster option to toggle installation scheduling
 - Bump mattermost operator to v0.8.0
